HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: [XND]Survival Tools oficially reborn.|Introduced new tool tiers:|img:Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\primal_axe.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\primal_hammer.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\primal_sickle.png|caption:Primitive tools|img:Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\Axe.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\Hammer.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\Pickaxe.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\Sickle.png|caption:Medieval tools (Original)|img:Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\Shovel.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\Chainsaw.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\ConstructionTool.png,Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\JackHammer.png|caption:Modern tools|img:Textures\Things\Item\Equipment\Tool\GlitterworldMultitool.png|caption:Spacer tool (Original)|Introduced various mod compatibilities
